group_1.narration: "Hey, I'm sorry you guys went@through all that work for nothing.@I didn't expect my sister would@keep dragging this out."
"Ah yes, that's right…@Among the other candidates was@a shrine maiden who got possessed…@Many horrific disasters ensued."
"...In the end,@another shrine maiden exorcized her…@but at the cost of her own life...@I don't really know what happened."
"Oh no, it's not due to lack of interest, it's just…@we can't determine what exactly occurred,@so it's rather hard to explain…"
"...The people of Kuna claim we had@the shrine maiden possessed on purpose,@but that's simply not the case.@We don't have that capability…@It's beyond the realm of human knowledge."
"And of course, I don't believe Toyo@is the child of a Cursed God…@I mean, how could a Cursed God@even HAVE a child…? Hahaha."
"I know my older sister@doesn't actually believe it, too…@I think she just doesn't want to risk@that inexplicable tragedy occurring again."
"...That's about all I can say for now.@Could you wait while I put together a new plan?@I'm determined to make Toyo our successor!"
"So I can take control of Yamatai, of course...@Hahaha...just kidding."

group_1.textLeft: After talking to her little brother, I feel like@I'm starting to understand things better…

group_1.textRight: You think that potential successor really was@a Magical Girl who became a Witch…?
And the Magical Girl who defeated her@lost her life, too…

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure once she knew the truth and the deed@was done, she destroyed her own Soul Gem…
…Well, all that stuff about the old successors@is in the past.
It's sad, but we just gotta let it go...@We'll go crazy if we keep stewing on it.
The problem is that Himiko is deeply@entrenched with all this.

group_1.textRight: I guess that's why she got her hackles up@about the "child of a Cursed God" thing.

group_1.textLeft: I just can't see how Toyo's supposed to be@accepted as the successor from here.

group_1.textRight: But…history does say she takes the throne…

group_1.textLeft: Wait, speaking of which, where IS Toyo?!

group_1.textRight: Shoot, come to think of it…

group_1.textCenter: Nahaha… How can I be picking bamboo shoots@at a time like this…?

group_1.narration: I wanted to follow in Lady Himiko's footsteps@and become just like her…
Running around the hills and fields...@Studying with Gramma and@the other shrine maidens...@Learning wisdom from my ancestors,@and putting it to good use in the Spirit Arts...
I did all that, and now my efforts seem like@a stupid waste of time.
…If I knew this was how it was gonna end,@I should've done something more fun.
And what's left for me now that it's over?@I feel like I've lost everything...

group_1.textRight: If there's nothing left for you,@why not come to Kuna?
Don't be alarmed...@I'm just here to talk.
To inform you, Lady Toyo...of the truth.
